==Trivia==
* This is the first time a 5-star character was used as a member of another 5-star character's trial team.
** The last time Keqing appeared on a Test Run was in [[Test Run - Character Trial Event/2021-02-17]].
** Keqing's artifact set changed from [[Brave Heart]] to [[Thundering Fury]].
* The following team compositions were changed this run:
** Zhongli's team was changed from Kaeya and Lisa to Kaeya, Lisa and Keqing.
** Tartaglia's team was changed from Kaeya to Xingqiu, Fischl and Beidou.
